attributes.action: NHS Patient Deaths: Criminal Prosecution for Corporate Manslaughter must take place!
attributes.additional_details:
The thousands (still no exact number) of patients that have died. Their deaths have been described as 'Unnecessary' or 'Preventable'. The words linked to deaths caused by someone else are normally manslaughter or murder....not oops.
This is Corporate Manslaughter! We need the Government to recognise the seriousness of what it has overseen and prosecute the people that oversaw the decline of patient care and ignore the important mortality rates.

rejection.details: Please see: urge the government to investigate NHS with a view to prosecuting Doctors and Nurses re Stafford Hospital
